item.title: By: Cosmo Topper
item.dc:creator: Cosmo Topper
item.description:
In, Jr. High School my band mates and I were punished because we were listening to Freak Out In the practice rooms instead of practicing our march music This speaks Volume
Someone just told me that Frank went in and re-recorded modern instruments to "We're Only in it for the Money""?? All I Know is The Gold Master original disc is a masterpiece. Don't *uck with Mother Nature!
Hungry Freaks Daddy! Mb aka ct
item.content:encoded:
In, Jr. High School my band mates and I were punished because we were listening to Freak Out In the practice rooms instead of practicing our march music
This speaks Volume

Someone just told me that Frank went in and re-recorded modern instruments to “We’re Only in it for the Money””??
All I Know is The Gold Master original disc is a masterpiece.
Don’t *uck with Mother Nature!

Hungry Freaks Daddy!
Mb aka ct
